title: ICS PRO HD GO Locker Theme
creator: The Android Lab

extendedInfo.description: ***Notice:Custom shortcut Now******(New) Lockscreen exit effects***Ice Cream Sandwich GO Launcher EX Locker! You must have GO LOCKER  app Installed to useICS  HD New Go Launcher EX LocWith Go.Locker now you have this on your phone in any version Ice Cream Sandwich Lockscreen!How to use:1. Make sure GO Launcher EX V2.63 or above and GO Locker v1.05 have been installed2. Click âMENUâ->3 Preferencesâ->4 Theme Settingsâ->5 GO Locker-> My lockerââ 6 Choose the theme "ICS Go Locker"Any issues or changes to GO LOCK SCREENwill be noticed and this lock screen will be updated consistently with the GO LOCKER app itselfvisit in play store torehttps://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=The+Android+LabYou must have GO LOCKER app Installed to use.With Go Locker now you have this on your phone in any version Ice Cream Sandwich Lock screen for Galaxy S2, Galaxy S3 and Galaxy R Style!!Extensively Tested on:Samsung Galaxy NexusSamsung Galaxy NoteLG Optimus OneMotorola Photon 4GSHW-M290KSamsung Galaxy S2Motorola DefyLG Optimus OneAnother proof to the world that Android is much better than iPhone.

reviews.title: Looks nice and fast!
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my S3. Alot of lockers I was using were glitchy or had a delay. This one is rather quick and opens up quick. Worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: I\'ve had a go locker lockscreen before which was really laggy, this works brilliantly, but there is a small annoying problem, I\'m not 100% sure but I dont think the unlocking circle is in the middle of the screen,its not in line with the home button on my Samsung anyway...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: App looks nice but you can utilize drop down notification bar in ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Custom images
reviews.comment: I love that when I add a different program to the locker the graphics actually change. No more having the camera image linking to my gmail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be perfect...
reviews.comment: Gets rid of my status bar, unlock circle isn\'t centered,  and if you quickly lock and unlock the phone it won\'t be locked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just wish the time wasn\'t reflected.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Its the best ics lock screen but im only giving 4 stars since the lock circle its not in the middle please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Truly nice lockscreen.
reviews.comment: Love it\'s customizable shortcut. Please add font size options. It is quite small for me. Tyvm :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Issue with the sensation 4g
reviews.comment: When the screen times out and locks on it own, i get my older lock screen on top of this one, Plz fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Refund
reviews.comment: Keeps shuting down my system I would like a refund
reviews.author: Natassha Johnson

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: It lags when i try to unlock it j
reviews.author: Serjio Blockus

reviews.title: Definitely recommend this locker
reviews.comment: Love the look, love the customizable icons. Only wish go locker had support for timed locks. I hate having to put pattern in every time screen goes off. Otherwise, job well done. Best locker I\'ve used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool but...
reviews.comment: Looks good and it\'s nice to be able to customize the app shortcuts. Update fixed the settings menu.  One gripe, the custom apps and circle animation looks very pixilated not \'HD\'. Whether that\'s a limitation of my phone I dunno.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Customer service A+
reviews.comment: Yes there were some mistakes like the custom setting. Theses guys listened and fixed it. Now you can change the apps for the icons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Lock ring off center to the right. EVO 3D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Just wish their were more backgrounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Locker
reviews.comment: I love the look of ICS and this is a great compliment to everything else ics on my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is great but is there anyway you can make it so that the lock screen shows the battery level even when it\'s not charging? That would be great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: I\'ll give it 5 stars if it has notifications on the screen like missed calls and text instead having to touch the unlock icon every time to see
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: Very good, but the icons are pixely...
reviews.author: A Google User
